[00:00.00]THATS WHAT I WANT (Explicit) - Lil Nas X
[00:01.76]Lyrics by：Montero Hill/Omer Fedi/Blake Slatkin/Ryan Tedder/Keegan Bach
[00:03.53]Composed by：Montero Hill/Omer Fedi/Blake Slatkin/Ryan Tedder/Keegan Bach
[00:05.30]One two three four
[00:06.82]Need a boy who can cuddle with me all night
[00:09.56]Keep me warm love me long be my sunlight
[00:12.27]Tell me lies we can argue we can fight
[00:14.30]Yeah we did it before but we'll do it tonight
[00:16.97]
[00:17.68]That afro black boy with the gold teeth
[00:20.40]He dark skin lookin' at me like he know me
[00:23.03]I wonder if he got the G or the B
[00:25.20]Let me find out and see he comin' over to me yeah
[00:28.61]These days I'm way too lonely
[00:31.33]I'm missin' out I know
[00:33.38]
[00:34.16]These days I'm way too alone
[00:36.11]And I'm known for givin' love away but
[00:38.53]I want
[00:39.23]I
[00:41.27]Someone to love me
[00:44.01]I need
[00:44.84]I
[00:46.73]Someone who needs me
[00:48.88]
[00:49.72]'Cause it don't feel right when it's late at night
[00:52.47]And it's just me in my dreams
[00:54.87]So I want
[00:55.64]I
[00:57.65]Someone to love
[00:59.64]That's what I f**kin' want
[01:01.03]
[01:03.61]Look you know it's harder to find in these times
[01:06.61]But I got nothin' but love on my mind
[01:08.84]My mind
[01:09.55]I need a baby while I'm in my prime
[01:11.56]Need an adversary to my down and weary
[01:14.33]Like tell me that's life when I'm stressin' at night
[01:17.14]Be like "You'll be okay" and "Everything is alright" uh
[01:20.10]Love me or nothin' 'cause I'm not wanting anything
[01:22.47]But your loving your body and a little bit of your brain
[01:25.98]These days I'm way too lonely
[01:28.67]I'm missin' out I know
[01:30.68]

[01:41.26]I need
[01:42.22]I
[01:44.02]Someone who needs me
[01:46.15]
[01:46.97]'Cause it don't feel right when it's late at night
[01:49.77]And it's just me in my dreams
[01:52.10]So I want
[01:52.87]I
[01:54.91]Someone to love
[01:56.93]That's what I f**kin' want

data.trans:
[ti:THATS WHAT I WANT (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:MONTERO (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.76]//
[00:03.53]//
[00:05.30]一 二 三 四
[00:06.82]需要一位爱人 与我整晚相拥
[00:09.56]给我温暖 爱我长久 成为我的阳光
[00:12.27]说谎欺骗我 我们可以争论 我们可以争斗
[00:14.30]我们以前就这样做过 但今晚我们会重蹈覆辙
[00:16.97]
[00:17.68]戴着金色牙套 留着爆炸式发型的家伙
[00:20.40]他皮肤黝黑 注视着我 好像他认识我似的
[00:23.03]我不禁好奇他是否有爱人
[00:25.20]让我拭目以待吧 他向我走来
[00:28.61]这些日子 我孤独寂寞
[00:31.33]我知道 我错过许多美好
[00:33.38]
[00:34.16]这些日子 我孤单不已
[00:36.11]大家都知道我愿意付出真心
[00:38.53]我渴望
[00:39.23]我
[00:41.27]有人真心爱我
[00:44.01]我需要
[00:44.84]我
[00:46.73]有人也需要我
[00:48.88]
[00:49.72]因为每到夜深人静的时候 我就感到难过
[00:52.47]我的梦境之中 只有我孤身一人
[00:54.87]所以我渴望
[00:55.64]我
[00:57.65]有人真心爱我
[00:59.64]这就是我梦寐以求的心愿
[01:01.03]
[01:03.61]听着 你知道现在真爱难觅
[01:06.61]但我心中只有爱
[01:08.84]我的心中
[01:09.55]在我最美好的年华里 我渴望拥有挚爱
[01:11.56]需要一位对手帮我对抗沮丧和疲惫
[01:14.33]告诉我这就是生活 当我在夜晚感到焦虑不安时
[01:17.14]对我说着 你会好起来的 还有一切都会安然无恙
[01:20.10]要么好好爱我 要么别来招惹我 因为我别无所求
[01:22.47]除了你的爱 你的身体 还有你的聪明才智
[01:25.98]这些日子我孤单不已
[01:28.67]我知道 我错过许多美好
[01:30.68]
